name: Throw The Hammer Free
description:
That Flash hammer throwing game returned in iPhone and iPod edition!!
The way to play arrives and is easy. Everything is decided by only three taps.
Aim at the inlet length and the angle and aim at world NO.1 according to close timing.

A free version is a fight with oneself. The game frequency is practiced because it is unrestricted to one's heart's content, and it is possible to challenge the world rally. (A pay version is upcoming. )

Please improve the skill without reserve between until opening to the public.

How to play
STEP.1 :: The player starts running by the tap of the first time.
STEP.2 ::The tap of the second times decides the position that the pitcher throws out.
(It is an of course foul when beginning to see from a certain borderline. )
STEP.3 ::The angle is decided by the tap of the third times, and it throws out at that time.
